Reviews.Title: “Nice”
Reviews.Author: AnAmericanintheUK
Reviews.Content: hotel spacious clean modern feel enjoyed layout nice bathroom bed desk light hardwood floors view city fine location walking distance sites restaurants block metro staff fine particularly friendly main downside air conditioning little weak run constantly middle night broke heated solved temperature window created sound madrid nightlife doesnt die 5am overall stay pleasant worth reasonable price

Reviews.Title: “Decent Hotel - Some Caveats”

Reviews.Content: stayed 305 business trip april 2011 8 nights hotel close office five minutes walking block arguelles metro station easily city stops changing lines previous reviewer mentioned front desk service varied person person location heart city nice clean safe neighborhood close metro convenient office corner spacious clean bad facing consistently noisy deal except air conditioning nonexistent due noise couldnt window ill chalk language differences front desk told hotel air conditioning colleague told air conditioning experienced sleepless nights air stifling couldnt window due noise doors didnt mechanism close softly wee hours morning people return barsrestaurants jolted awake doors slamming shut hotel charges 1 euro usage safe matters toiletries provided varied body lotion conditioner colleague told conditioner supplied guests hotel value price quirks ive stayed suites viena previously value found hotel updated location closer plaza de espana etc trip solid nights sleep ill probably booking elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Great value & location, just know the minor limitations"”
Reviews.Author: PlasticMoonRain
Reviews.Content: brought family night stay madrid traveling teens opted family pretty sizable beds pushed adults bunk bed kids surprisingly little bigger expected im expecting cramped europe kids loved bunk bed beds totally fine space little tight biggest complaint lack drawer space 4person completely due bathroom totally fine day returned spotless hotels location dead center madrid prado matter block arguelles metro station couple stops matter christmas day family walked straight plaza royal palace heart plaza mayor truly grand experience neighborhood nice morning family cafe es tea street simple inexpensive breakfast t3 offers tremendous value kept saying ourselves deal economical stayed family opposed splitting separate doubles business corner near front desk pc free internet access minor quibble official concierge hotel deal except quality front desk help varies depending duty folks front desk terrific front desk employees dont camp suggestion anyplace eat plaza 10 minute walk hotel exactly name wifes atm card returned local bank machine wife call bank speak spanish didnt reckless card refused wife woman shift couldnt happier spend time madrid nice clean hotel value wouldnt hesitate recommend t3

Reviews.Title: “Clean comfortable hotel, good quiet location - perfect for a weekend trip”

Reviews.Content: arrived home 3 day break madrid hen party moved prior trip hotel t3 pipe broke original hotel expect pleased spacious comfortable clean whilst basic example fridge teacoffee 1 english tv channel absolutely perfect location main hub city literally metro stop 4 stops centre action buy 10 trips metro 9 euros worth walking heat advisable supermarket opposite ideal stocking water snacks etc overall impressed stay
